reports.name: Trial Balance
reports.query: {"name":"Trial Balance","category_id":"7","category_id_model":"category","__category_id":"Financial","controller":"accounting\/accounts","primary_acl_group_model":"groups","owned_by":"1","owned_by_model":"users","__owned_by":"System Admin","fields":[{"accounts.name":{"alias":"Account","sortable":"1","searchable":"1"}},{"accounts.account_types.name":{"alias":"Account Type","sortable":"1","searchable":"1"}},{"accounts.business_key":{"alias":"Code","sortable":"1","searchable":"1"}},{"(SELECT SUM(te.debit) FROM `accounting__accounts` AS `asum` LEFT JOIN  `accounting__journal_entry_lines` AS `te` ON( `asum`.`id`=`te`.`account_id` AND `te`.deleted != '1' ) LEFT JOIN  `accounting__journal_entries` AS `tr` ON( `tr`.`id`=`te`.`journal_entry_id` AND `tr`.deleted != '1' )  LEFT JOIN  `accounting__journal_entry_status` AS `ts` ON( `tr`.`status_id`=`ts`.`id` AND `ts`.deleted != '1' ) WHERE   (tr.period_id='{{PERIOD_ID}}') AND  ( asum.lft >= accounts.lft &&  asum.lft  <= accounts.rgt  && asum.rgt <= accounts.rgt ) AND ( asum.deleted != '1' ) AND ( ts.business_key = 'posted' ))":{"alias":"Debit","sortable":"1","searchable":"1"}},{"(SELECT SUM(te.credit) FROM `accounting__accounts` AS `asum`   LEFT JOIN  `accounting__journal_entry_lines` AS `te` ON( `asum`.`id`=`te`.`account_id` AND `te`.deleted != '1' ) LEFT JOIN  `accounting__journal_entries` AS `tr` ON( `tr`.`id`=`te`.`journal_entry_id` AND `tr`.deleted != '1' ) LEFT JOIN  `accounting__journal_entry_status` AS `ts` ON( `tr`.`status_id`=`ts`.`id` AND `ts`.deleted != '1' )  WHERE   (tr.period_id='{{PERIOD_ID}}') AND  ( asum.lft >= accounts.lft &&  asum.lft  <= accounts.rgt  && asum.rgt <= accounts.rgt )  AND ( asum.deleted != '1' ) AND ( ts.business_key = 'posted' )  )":{"alias":"Credit","sortable":"1","searchable":"1"}},{"accounts.internal_types.name":{"alias":"Type","is_invisible":"1","sortable":"1","searchable":"1"}},{"accounts.currencies.currency_code":{"alias":"Currency","sortable":"1","searchable":"1"}}],"order":[],"created_by":"1","render_as":"index","show_has_many_records":"one","parent_id_model":"parent_listview","method":"index","modified_by":"1"}

reports.description: Trial Balance is a list of closing balances of ledger accounts on a certain date and is the first step towards the preparation of financial statements. It is usually prepared at the end of an accounting period to assist in the drafting of financial statements. Ledger balances are segregated into debit balances and credit balances.

reports.name: Balance Sheet
reports.query: {"name":"Balance Sheet","category_id":"7","category_id_model":"category","__category_id":"Financial","controller":"accounting\/accounts","is_public":"1","description":"A balance sheet is often described as a \"snapshot of a company's financial condition\".\r\n","primary_acl_group":"847","primary_acl_group_model":"groups","__primary_acl_group":"Region-USA","owned_by":"1","owned_by_model":"users","__owned_by":"System Admin","fields":[{"accounts.name":{"sortable":"1","searchable":"1"}},{"(SELECT SUM(te.debit) FROM `accounting__accounts` AS `asum` LEFT JOIN  `accounting__journal_entry_lines` AS `te` ON( `asum`.`id`=`te`.`account_id` AND `te`.deleted != '1' ) LEFT JOIN  `accounting__journal_entries` AS `tr` ON( `tr`.`id`=`te`.`journal_entry_id` AND `tr`.deleted != '1' )  LEFT JOIN  `accounting__journal_entry_status` AS `ts` ON( `tr`.`status_id`=`ts`.`id` AND `ts`.deleted != '1' ) WHERE   (tr.period_id='{{PERIOD_ID}}') AND  ( asum.lft >= accounts.lft &&  asum.lft  <= accounts.rgt  && asum.rgt <= accounts.rgt ) AND ( asum.deleted != '1' ) AND ( ts.business_key = 'posted' ))":{"alias":"Debit","sortable":"1","searchable":"1"}},{"(SELECT SUM(te.credit) FROM `accounting__accounts` AS `asum`   LEFT JOIN  `accounting__journal_entry_lines` AS `te` ON( `asum`.`id`=`te`.`account_id` AND `te`.deleted != '1' ) LEFT JOIN  `accounting__journal_entries` AS `tr` ON( `tr`.`id`=`te`.`journal_entry_id` AND `tr`.deleted != '1' ) LEFT JOIN  `accounting__journal_entry_status` AS `ts` ON( `tr`.`status_id`=`ts`.`id` AND `ts`.deleted != '1' )  WHERE   (tr.period_id='{{PERIOD_ID}}') AND  ( asum.lft >= accounts.lft &&  asum.lft  <= accounts.rgt  && asum.rgt <= accounts.rgt )  AND ( asum.deleted != '1' ) AND ( ts.business_key = 'posted' )  )":{"alias":"Credit","sortable":"1","searchable":"1"}}],"order":[],"created_by":"1","render_as":"index","show_has_many_records":"one","parent_id_model":"parent_listview","method":"index","modified_by":"1"}
